attributes.action: suitable crossings outside all schools especially ones on main roads.
attributes.additional_details:
after a number of school children being knocked down, we want action to be taken, to safeguard our children at the beginning of the day, and at he end of each school day. Children who attend the affected schools have both suffered serious head injuries, and something needs to be done.in order to prevent it happening again, or even worse some young child being killed.

Parents and the community want crossings to be placed outside schools even if there is a crossing further down, as most children will chance crossing if the crossing is out of there way for their walking journey.
